Articles.Content:
I'm Currently interested in the Elysian Sparrow missile mod. It's only one object and the mechanics are simpler than BD armory or most other weapons mod. But here's the kicker, it's only in version .20 and I run version 1.04. I was wondering what kind of changes one would have to make to make the mod compatible with my setup?

Mod:[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35065-0-20-Elysian-Empire-Advanced-research-Division-0-0-01-A-World-War-K-Mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35065-0-20-Elysian-Empire-Advanced-research-Division-0-0-01-A-World-War-K-Mod)

Thank you and stay awesome!![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-16T23:57:09Z" title="07/16/2015 11:57  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 16, 2015</time> by RandomName101**

While I'm no modder, I will that that's a

1 - .20

2 - .21

3 - .22

4 - .23

5 - .23.5

6 - .24

7 - .25

8 - .90

9 - 1.0.0

10 -1.0.1

11 - 1.0.2

12 - 1.0.3

13 - 1.0.4

A 13-version update... that'd take quite the revamp to work, I believe.

Guess it cannot be just recompiled but needs some source editing first in order to work with 1.0.4. BUT

> 
> License
> Please contact the original author before redistributing any changes to this mod, for now.

Why don't you contact the mod's author for update? He was active today.
